page.title: 17Public Services
page.content: {The Fire station}was opened by D.E.Hughes Esq on the 3rd Dec.1966. {Mr D.E.Hughes}is the Fire Chief of Herefordshire. The Fire engine when full of everything weighs 11 and a quarter tons. There are 11 retained men all of whom are part time firemen with other full time jobs such as builder, architect lorry driver, mechanic and farmer. They have about 40 fires a year. {Ambulance station.}In Leintwardine there is an ambulance station with only one ambulance. There are two men who drive the ambulance. There are different men each day. {Police station.}We have a police house in Leintwardine and a policeman whose name is P.C.Cebo. He covers a very large area. He comes into school to talk to the children about safety and the work of the police force.
